channel.title: urxvt on whatacold's world

item.title: Start a new terminal(urxvt) at current buffer's default-directory on Emacs
item.author: whatacold@gmail.com (whatacold)
item.description: I have been really enjoying the more concentration workflow qtile, a tiling window manager, brings me, since I started using it a few months ago. I am more focus on the current task now as all the windows I care about are laid out on the same screen. As I get more used to qtile at every day's work, I noticed that I became more depend on short-life terminal sessions.
